mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_sex, member_email, member_phone, member_level, member_join_date, member_point, member_zip, member_addr1, member_addr2, provider_id, member_privacy_agree, member_privacy_date, member_service_agree, member_bus_agree) VALUES (#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberBirth},#{memberSex},#{memberEmail},#{memberPhone},#{memberLevel},);
